about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Inventurus Knowledge Solutions Limited (IKS Health) provides services to healthcare enterprises such as handling administrative chores/work. The company helps doctors and other healthcare providers by handling their paperwork and administrative tasks. IKS Health offers services such as clinical support, medical documentation management, virtual medical scribing and more.

The company is a healthcare technology company that helps make it easier and faster for patients to get the care they need while reducing the administrative burden on healthcare providers.

Inventurus Knowledge Solutions Limited offer a platform that enables healthcare enterprises in outpatient and inpatient care.

  • Outpatient service facilities, also known as ambulatory care, provide medical care without requiring admission to a hospital or other facility and include observation, consultation, diagnosis, rehabilitation, intervention, and treatment services.
  • Inpatient care refers to the provision of medical treatment for patients who have been admitted to a hospital or medical facility, requiring an overnight stay or an extended duration.

As of September 30, 2024, IKS serves over 778 healthcare organizations, including health systems, multi-specialty medical groups, and other outpatient and inpatient providers. Key clients include Mass General Brigham Inc., Texas Health Care PLLC, and The GI Alliance Management.

The company has a team of over 13,528 employees, including 2,612 clinically-trained professionals, and a consultative sales force operating in the US, Canada, and Australia.

Their Competitive Strengths:

  • Comprehensive one-stop platform with diversified offerings across the outpatient and inpatient care value chain serving key stakeholders such as patients, physicians, nurses and healthcare organizations.
  • Leveraging digital evolution, transformation and automation technologies to create sustained value based on outcomes delivered.
  • Strong brand amongst healthcare organizations and physicians.
  • Sustainable and scalable business model offering clients flexibility and cost-savings and high-touch 215 engagement through access to project executive sponsors and leadership teams creating cross-selling opportunities.

anchorInvestors.summary: Inventurus IPO raises Rs 1120.18 crore from anchor investors. Inventurus IPO Anchor bid date is December 11 2024. Inventurus IPO Anchor Investors list

contactDetails.full_address: Inventurus Knowledge Solutions Limited, Building No. 5 & 6 Unit No. 801, 8th Floor Mindspace SEZ Thane Belapur Road, Airoli Navi Mumbai Thane 400708

faqs.question: What is the Inventurus IPO?
faqs.answer:
Inventurus IPO is a main-board IPO of 18795510 equity shares of the face value of ₹1 aggregating up to ₹2,497.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹1329 per share. The minimum order quantity is 11.

The IPO opens on December 12, 2024, and closes on December 16, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Inventurus IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Inventurus IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Inventurus IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Inventurus IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Inventurus IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Inventurus IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Inventurus IPO opens on December 12, 2024 and closes on December 16, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Inventurus IPO?
faqs.answer: Inventurus IPO lot size is 11, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,619.

faqs.question: How to apply for Inventurus IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Inventurus IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Inventurus IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Inventurus IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 17, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 18, 2024. Check the Inventurus IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Inventurus IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Inventurus IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 19, 2024.

reservation.summary: Inventurus IPO offers 18795510 shares. 5619154 (29.9%) to QIB 2809576 (14.95%) to NII 1873050 (9.97%) to RII and 8428730 (44.84%) to Anchor investors.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Inventurus IPO is subscribed 52.68 times on December 16 2024 6:15:08 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 14.55 times in the retail category 80.64 times in the QIB category and 23.25 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
